name: Braintek
description:
Established in 2002, Braintek is a full-service computer and networking company specializing in the needs of small/medium-sized businesses in the Greater Houston areas.
The computer specialists at Braintek have over 16 years of practical and technical experience working with companies large and small. Braintek has Microsoft, Cisco, Novell and CompTIA certifications. We are also members of The Woodlands Chamber of Commerce. We understand that a full-time IT department isnâ€™t cost effective for small/medium-sized companies.
